DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, single-blind, placebo-controlled, crossover study to examine the effect of pramlintide on the pharmacokinetics of an orally administered medication
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of an Orally Administered Medication When Taken in Conjunction With Pramlintide
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus treated with diet and/or oral agents HbA1c 6.511.0
